meanings.definition: A person who believes that human efforts are pointless and ineffective.
meanings.sent1: The futilitarian sighed, feeling that nothing he did mattered.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a futilitarian for her pessimistic outlook on life.
meanings.sent3: The futilitarian joked that trying to find a needle in a haystack was a perfect representation of his life.
meanings.sent4: In a world of dreamers, he stood out like a futilitarian in a sea of optimists.
meanings.sent5: The image of the futilitarian sitting alone in the dark, contemplating the futility of it all, was haunting.
